Optional content for optionalSelectInput

picker_options_content.Rd

Prepares content to be displayed in optionalSelectInput with icons and labels

picker_options_content(var_name, var_label, var_type)

Arguments

var_name

(atomic vector of character) variable name

var_label

(atomic vector of character) variable alternative name - for example variable label

var_type

(atomic vector of character) class of the variable.

Value

(atomic vector of character) HTML contents with all elements combined

Examples

teal:::picker_options_content(
  var_name = c("SEX", "BRMRKR1"),
  var_label = c("Sex", "Biomarker 1"),
  var_type = c("factor", "numeric")
)
#> [1] "<i class=\"fa fa-chart-bar\" role=\"presentation\" aria-label=\"chart-bar icon\"></i> SEX <small class=\"text-muted\">Sex</small>"                        
#> [2] "<i class=\"fa fa-sort-numeric-up\" role=\"presentation\" aria-label=\"sort-numeric-up icon\"></i> BRMRKR1 <small class=\"text-muted\">Biomarker 1</small>"

Contents
